refnamediv.refpurpose: removes a CR (\015) at the end of each line of input, if a CR is present.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: delcr reads input from stdin and writes it to stdout. It removes a CR (\015) at the end of each line of input, if a CR is present. It does not remove a CR at the end of a partial final line.

listitem.para: a wrapper for a command that performs CR insertion on its standard I/O

refsection.title: History
refsection.para: delcr was originally part of DanielJ.Bernstein's ucspi-tcp toolset in 1999.

refsection.title: Author
refsection.para: Original code and documentation by DanielJ.Bernstein. Documentation modernizations by Jonathande Boyne Pollard.
